<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:mats_500</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>mats_500</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Interpretación geométrica de los determinantes</string>
            <string language="en">Geometric interpretation of determinants</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geometrische Deutung von bestimmenden Faktoren</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Traduction géométrique des causes 
déterminantes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Interpretação geométrica das determinantes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Interpretazione geometrica dei fattori 
determinanti</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γεωμετρική ερμηνεία των καθοριστικών παραγόντων</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">unidad didáctica que desarrolla mediante simulaciones las propiedades de los determinantes. Se estudian las propiedades de los determinantes desde un punto de vista geométrico, mediante los vectores en el plano.</string>
            <string language="en">teaching unit which uses simulations to study the properties of determinants from a geometric point of view, using vectors on the plane.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">determinante</string>
            <string language="en">determinant</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">matriz</string>
            <string language="en">matrix</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">cálculo</string>
            <string language="en">calculus</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">vectores</string>
            <string language="en">vectors</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">propiedad</string>
            <string language="en">property</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unterrichtende Maßeinheit, welche 
Gebrauchsimulationen, zum der Eigenschaften von bestimmenden Faktoren 
von einem geometrischen Gesichtspunkt zu studieren, verwendend auf der
Fläche vectors.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">unité d'enseignement quelles simulations 
d'utilisations pour étudier les propriétés des causes 
déterminantes d'un point de vue géométrique, utilisant dirige sur 
l'avion.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">unidade ensinando que simulações dos usos para 
estudar as propriedades das determinantes de um ponto geométrico da 
vista, se usando vectors no plano.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">unità d'istruzione quali simulazioni di usi per 
studiare le proprietà dei fattori determinanti da un punto di vista 
geometrico, usando vectors sull'aereo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μονάδα διδασκαλίας που χρησιμοποιεί τις προσομοιώσεις 
για να μελετήσει τις ιδιότητες των καθοριστικών παραγόντων από 
γεωμετρική άποψη, χρησιμοποιώντας τα διανύσματα στο αεροπλάνο.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">bestimmend</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Matrix</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kalkül</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Vektoren</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eigenschaft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">déterminant</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">matrice</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">calcul</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">vecteurs</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">propriété</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">determinante</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">matriz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
